/usr/bin/clang++ CMakeFiles/cuda_demo.dir/src/_test.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cuda_demo.dir/src/test.cu.o CMakeFiles/cuda_demo.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o cuda_demo   -L/opt/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/opt/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -L/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/13.3.0  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/cuda/lib64 /opt/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -ldl /usr/lib/librt.a /opt/cuda/lib64/libcublas.so -llapack -llapacke -lblas -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
